urls.title: icon-calendar
urls.description: Dredging firm Van Oord has been contracted by the Environment Agency to continue to protect the Lincolnshire coast of the UK for the next four years.¬†For these nourishments, Van Oord will continue to deploy its trailing hopper suction dredger HAM 316 that is powered by biofuel.

text:
Our NatureBid auction is now open and closes on Sun 28th!

Landowners and farmers in the Upper Aire, you can now submit your funding bids for natural flood management and water quality improvement.

More info here: https://t.co/VBYg2SVtNR

@EnvAgencyYNE @SylvaFoundation https://t.co/6h5Y8bzWt2

urls.title: NatureBid project to improve water quality and flood management | Yorkshire Wildlife Trust
urls.description: We are pleased to announce a new pilot project which awards funding to landowners in the Upper Aire to improve water quality and flood management.
